results.name: Master Marksman
results.description: Kill 50 human and nonhuman opponents by striking them in the head with a crossbow bolt.

results.name: I Wore Ofieri Before It Was Cool
results.description: Collect all available Ofieri armor and horse gear, and at least one Ofieri sword.

results.name: Humpty Dumpty
results.description: Kill 10 opponents by knocking them off somewhere high with the Aard Sign.

results.name: Overkill
results.description: Make an opponent suffer from bleeding, poisoning and burning simultaneously. Do this 10 times.

results.name: Return to Sender
results.description: Kill 3 opponents with their own arrows.

results.name: Can Quit Anytime I Want
results.description: Be under the influence of seven potions or decoctions at the same time.
